<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent"> <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <always_available>false</always_available> <category/> <fallback>false</fallback> <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session> <keyword>AMAZON.StopIntent</keyword> <name>Cancel</name> <next_intent/> <order/> <output_speech_format/> <reprompt_speech_format/> <script><![CDATA[(function(content, attributes, erb){ erb.setOutputSpeech("PlainText", "Thanks for stopping by!", ""); erb.setEnd(true);
result = erb.response;
})(content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder());]]></script> <slot_name_1/> <slot_name_2/> <slot_name_3/> <slot_type_1/> <slot_type_2/> <slot_type_3/> <sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-03-06 03:39:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>95e4fe0edb5db200d1a9f1351d961919</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jc</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-03-13 22:42:15</sys_updated_on> <top_level_intent>false</top_level_intent> </x_snc_amazon_echo_intent> </record_update>
